Package edu.cnm.deepdive.scalescroller.model

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.scalescroller.model.Level
  • public class Level
extends Object
    The Level class contains game logic used in conjunction with the GameViewModel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Level​(Scale scale)
      The constructor initializes the scale used in the level, and creates a list of the correct notes from the scale.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Note[] getCorrectNotes()
      Returns the correct notes associated with the scale (and by extension, the level).
      int getHearts()
      Returns the current number of lives/hearts left.
      Note[] getIncorrectNotes()
      Returns the notes not associated with the scale.
      Boolean getLevelWon()
      Returns true if the level has been won and false if it has been lost.
      String getNotesString()
      Returns a String representation of the correct notes of the scale.
      Scale getScale()
      Returns the scale associated with the level.
      int getScore()
      Returns the current score in the level.
      void setHearts​(boolean heartAdded)
      Increments or decrements the number of hearts left.
      void setScore​(int points)
      Sets the score for the level by adding the new points.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        public Level​(Scale scale)
        The constructor initializes the scale used in the level, and creates a list of the correct notes from the scale.
        Parameters:
        scale - The scale used.

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns the current score in the level.
        Returns:
        The current score.

      • setScore

        public void setScore​(int points)
        Sets the score for the level by adding the new points. Also sets levelWon to true if the minimum score has been reached.
        Parameters:
        points - The points to be added to the current score.

      • getHearts

        public int getHearts()
        Returns the current number of lives/hearts left.
        Returns:
        The hearts left.

      • setHearts

        public void setHearts​(boolean heartAdded)
        Increments or decrements the number of hearts left. Also sets levelWon to false if there are no hearts left.
        Parameters:
        heartAdded - True if a heart has been added, false if it has been removed.

      • getScale

        public Scale getScale()
        Returns the scale associated with the level.
        Returns:
        The level's scale.

      • getLevelWon

        public Boolean getLevelWon()
        Returns true if the level has been won and false if it has been lost. If the level is in progress, this will return null.
        Returns:
        Whether the level has been won, lost, or is in progress.

      • getCorrectNotes

        public Note[] getCorrectNotes()
        Returns the correct notes associated with the scale (and by extension, the level).
        Returns:
        An array of Note that belong in the scale.

      • getIncorrectNotes

        public Note[] getIncorrectNotes()
        Returns the notes not associated with the scale.
        Returns:
        An array of Note that do not belong in the scale.

      • getNotesString

        public String getNotesString()
        Returns a String representation of the correct notes of the scale.
        Returns:
        A String of correctNotes.
